channel.title: YouTube To iPhone 5 Converter: iPhone 5 YouTube Downloader
channel.description:
The new iPhone is coming, YouTube To iPhone 5 Downloader unique made for iPhone 5 can free download YouTube HD video and convert to iPhone 5 compatible formats for you personally to watch YouTube on iPhone 5 to the go.
Apple's next iPhone: iPhone 5, the new iPhone, or whatever Apple ends up calling it, will probable be announced on Wednesday, September 12, 2012 and released on Friday, September 21, 2012. Rumored capabilities incorporate a 4-inch, 16:9 display, a more rapidly Apple A5X chipset, true 4G LTE networking, and, obviously, thinner and lighter. The new generation of iPhone will launch in September. Although we're rather confident that we understand what the next iPhone 5 will look like, there's no method to know all of its characteristics and what it's capable of till Apple announces it upcoming month. The first software package we now have to suggest for you ------the a single that manufactured your iPhone 5 much more beneficial, download video from You Tube and match your new iPhone 5-----is iPhone 5 YouTube Downloader. It truly is not just download the video from You Tube, as it was made for, but additionally match the most recent generation of iPhone 5. The preponderance could relate to that. Even though iPhone 5 YouTube Downloader is possibly not the 1st one particular for YouTube Downloader for iPhone 5, however it can greatest match your new iPhone 5.
Key Features of YouTube Downloader for iPhone 5 - [url=http://www.youtube-to-iphone.com]YouTube iPhone 5 Converter[/url]:
Part 1. Free Download On the net Movies & Audios on Mac/Windows to iPhone movies
* The professional YouTube to iPhone downloader for Mac is totally no cost to download movies from YouTube and other on the net video sharing sites. It supports downloading a batch of YouTube movies up to 20 movies in considerable fast speed. * Freely download music from on the web audio websites, such as Pandora, Spotify, Myspace, etc.. * 3 easy ways to download on-line movies directly: click the Download button that appears within the top of the video, copy the video URL and click the Paste URL button to download, or drag and drop URL into the icon of YouTube to iPhone Downloader. * Available for downloading up to 20 on the internet movies at a time. * The iPhone YouTube Downloader can download on the web movies to your new iPhone 5 from other popular video-sharing sites such as Metacafe, Facebook, Vimeo, Liveleak, Break, Video Bash, Vevo, MyVideo, FunnyOrDie, PhotoBucket etc.
Part 2. Convert Movies & Audios
* Convert the downloaded videos to both standard and high-definition video formats, like MP4, AVI, MPG, WMV or HD MP4 (H.264, Xvid), HD AVI (Xvid) etc. * The YouTube to iPhone Converter can automatically or manually convert the downloaded videos to both standard and high-definition video formats, like MP4, AVI, MPG, WMV or HD MP4 (H.264, Xvid), HD AVI (Xvid) etc. for playback on iPhone. *The YouTube Downloader for iPhone easily extract audios from downloaded and existing movies and convert them to MP3, M4A, AAC, AC3, OGG etc.. You can also extract audio in M4R from YouTube to be your iPhone ringtone. * Output files for Apple devices, such as iPhone 5, iPod Touch 5G and iPad Mini can be directly added to iTunes.
Part 3. Manage & Play Videos
* Easily manage the downloaded videos and existing movies in the Library. Built-in FLV Player plays FLV videos on Mac/Windows freely * Not merely support YouTube to iPhone 3GS/4/4S, YouTube to new iPhone 5 converter, but also support the other Apple devices, such as iPod Touch, iPod Touch 5G and iPad 2, iPad 3, iPad Mini. The output files can be directly added to iTunes.
